subject: Antitrust Laws and Competition Issues
Organized Labor
Football
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: As the players’ suit against the N.F.L. begins Wednesday with court arguments, they will be represented by Jeffrey Kessler, one of the most prominent and provocative lawyers in sports.
